history.content:
Opportunity Through Data (OTD) is recruiting teachers for the Spring 2021 semester!
OTD is a Big Ideas funded data science education initiative that teaches introductory data science to underserved high school students and incarcerated women. Our goal is to make data science more accessible and equitable to these communities in hopes of diversifying the data science field.
We are looking for members to join as teachers, responsible for mentoring our high school students. Our applications are due Wednesday, November 25th at 11:59 PM PT and can be found here: bit.ly/OTDTeacher
If you have any questions, please refer to our website (http://otd.berkeley.edu/) or contact us at apply@otd.berkeley.edu
history.subject: Opportunity Through Data is hiring Data Science teachers!
